00061 class CORE_EXPORT QgsPoint
00062 {
00063   public:
00065     QgsPoint()
00066     {}
00067 
00069     QgsPoint( const QgsPoint& p );
00070 
00075     QgsPoint( double x, double y )
00076         : m_x( x ), m_y( y )
00077     {}
00078 
00079     ~QgsPoint()
00080     {}
00081 
00085     void setX( double x )
00086     {
00087       m_x = x;
00088     }
00089

00094     {
00095       m_y = y;
00096     }
00097

00100     {
00101       m_x = x;
00102       m_y = y;
00103     }

00110       return m_x;

00119     }

00169     QgsVector operator-( QgsPoint p ) const { return QgsVector( m_x - p.m_x, m_y - p.m_y ); }
00170     QgsPoint &operator+=( const QgsVector &v ) { *this = *this + v; return *this; }
00171     QgsPoint &operator-=( const QgsVector &v ) { *this = *this - v; return *this; }
00172     QgsPoint operator+( const QgsVector &v ) const { return QgsPoint( m_x + v.x(), m_y + v.y() ); }
00173     QgsPoint operator-( const QgsVector &v ) const { return QgsPoint( m_x - v.x(), m_y - v.y() ); }
00174

00187 inline bool operator==( const QgsPoint &p1, const QgsPoint &p2 )
00188 {
00189   if (( p1.x() == p2.x() ) && ( p1.y() == p2.y() ) )
00190     { return true; }
00191   else
00192     { return false; }
00193 }
00194 
00195 inline std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os, const QgsPoint &p )
00196 {
00197   // Use Local8Bit for printouts
00198   os << p.toString().toLocal8Bit().data();
00199   return os;
00200 }
